import React, {Component} from 'react'; import "./_basket_step_1.scss" class BasketStep1 extends Component { render() { const {setStep, basket, basketSum} = this.props; return ( <>
{basket.map((element, index)=> )}
Lp. miniaturka nazwa produktu ilość cena suma usuń
{index + 1} bransoletka {element.id} 3 {/*tu zmienna*/} {basketSum && basketSum.substr(0, basketSum.length-2)}, {basketSum && basketSum.substr(basketSum.length-2, 2)} zł suma
Wartość produktów: 5

) } } export default BasketStep1;
